name: Roswell Rescue©
description:
Roswell Rescue © (Windows Pc)

Rescue your Alien brethren and complete secondary missions while avoiding hostile attempts to down your craft and put YOU in the dissection queue! Navigate your ship over your target to engage the transporter. Avoid hostile fire from ground and air units.

Visit us on Twitter to view screen shots and videos of this game and upcoming titles Fingerbang© and  Da Vinci's Revenge©.  Follow us on Twitter - Dubya Studios
